akn:section.akn:heading: Devices, marks, labels, and certificates; simulations

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Devices to be made under authorization of Secretary

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Devices to be made under authorization of Secretary No brand manufacturer, printer, or other person, firm, or corporation shall cast, print, lithograph, or otherwise make any device containing any official mark or simulation thereof, or any label bearing any such mark or simulation, or any form of official certificate or simulation thereof, except as authorized by the Secretary.
